content:
## n8n@0.88.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.87.2...n8n@0.88.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-10-16 - Enhanced Fixes - Matrix: Added support for specifying a Matrix Homeserver URL - Salesforce: Added Custom Object resource and Custom Fields and Sort options - Bug Fixes - AWS SES: Fixed an issue with the Send Template operation for the Email resource - AWS SNS Trigger: Fixed an issue with the Subscriptions topic
